ConceptSets.name: Acute kidney injury (Broad definition) - Phenotype Phebruary

InclusionRules.name: Minimum prior observation period of 365 days
No ESKD at baseline
InclusionRules.description: To exclude cases with a diagnosis of End-Stage Kidney Disease in the 365 days before AKI occurrence. Period from -365 to -7 to account for ESKD due to the index episode of AKI

InclusionRules.name: No chronic dialysis at baseline
InclusionRules.description: To exclude all patients receiving chronic dialysis defined as more than 3 recorded events of dialysis in the 1 year- 7 days before index date

InclusionRules.name: Washout period with no AKI codes
InclusionRules.description: To rule out diagnosis codes that are follow ups (for example: check for status of recovery or progression, check sequelae, etc) from the actual event of AKI
